title: SAS Women's Heeled Sandals
features: A dash of casual with feminine sophistication, the Caress sandal wedge makes everyday comfort and style a breeze.
Strappy leather uppers with an open toe.
Slingback strap with an adjustable buckle closure.
Features SAS Tripad Cushions designed to comfort all three pressure points: the inside ball, outside ball and heel for all-day support.
